title: Web-Based Self-Directed Learning Program for Medical Histology and Histopathology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology and human anatomy understanding
context.additional_context: Flexible learning schedules and digital resource-centered education for working professionals

learning_goals: Students can accurately identify normal tissue structures and pathological changes in human tissues with over 80% accuracy using MAPA (Virtual Histology-Pathology Atlas)
Learners can analyze and report on at least three integrated histology-pathology cases through team-based projects on a web-based platform
In formative assessments, learners achieve at least 75% proficiency in interpreting digital slides and explaining clinical relevance
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
